00035   void HodoscopeWriteEngine::registerParameters()
00036   {
00037     _hostProcessor.relayRegisterProcessorParameter("HodoscopeWriteEngine_Prefix1",
00038                                                    "HodoscopeWriteEngine prefix to tree variables",
00039                                                    _prefix[0],
00040                                                    std::string("hod1"));
00041 
00042     _hostProcessor.relayRegisterProcessorParameter("HodoscopeWriteEngine_Prefix2",
00043                                                    "HodoscopeWriteEngine prefix to tree variables",
00044                                                    _prefix[1],
00045                                                    std::string("hod2"));
00046 
00047 
00048     _hostProcessor.relayRegisterProcessorParameter("HodoscopeWriteEngine_isModInverted",
00049                                                    "run - 48 have wrong hod numbers",
00050                                                    isModInverted,
00051                                                    (bool) false);
00052 
00053     _hostProcessor.relayRegisterProcessorParameter("HodoscopeWriteEngine_Height1",
00054                                                    "layer number for hodoscope 1",
00055                                                    height1,
00056                                                    0);
00057 
00058     _hostProcessor.relayRegisterProcessorParameter("HodoscopeWriteEngine_Height2",
00059                                                    "layer number for hodoscope 2",
00060                                                    height2,
00061                                                    13);
00062 
00063 
00064     _hostProcessor.relayRegisterInputCollection(LCIO::CALORIMETERHIT,_engineName+"_InCol1",
00065                                                 "Name of input collection",
00066                                                 _hitColName[0], std::string("HodoscopeHits")  );
00067 
00068     _hostProcessor.relayRegisterInputCollection(LCIO::CALORIMETERHIT,_engineName+"_InCol2",
00069                                                 "Name of input collection",
00070                                                 _hitColName[1], std::string("HodoscopeHits")  );
00071 
00072     _hostProcessor.relayRegisterInputCollection(LCIO::CALORIMETERHIT,_engineName+"_AhcalCol",
00073                                                 "Name of ahcal collection",
00074                                                 _ahcColName, std::string("CalorimeterHits")  );
00075 
00076       for (int i=0;i<2;i++) {
00077          char fname[256];
00078          sprintf(fname, "/afs/desy.de/user/t/torimart/work/CosmiTestLCIO/RootTreeWriter/engines/onePC%d.txt",i+1);
00079          FILE *fp = fopen(fname,"r");
00080          float ped, opc;
00081          int j=0;
00082          while(fscanf(fp,"%f %f", &ped, &opc) != EOF) {
00083             onePC[i][j] = opc;
00084             pedestal[i][j] = ped;
00085             j++;
00086          }
00087          fclose(fp);
00088       }
00089       corrF1 = new TF1("corrF1","8./TMath::Pi()*TMath::ATan(([0]*TMath::CosH([0]*(7.5-x))*TMath::Sin(TMath::Pi()/8.*(7.5-x))-TMath::Pi()/8.*TMath::SinH([0]*(7.5-x))*TMath::Cos(TMath::Pi()/8*(7.5-x)))/([0]*TMath::Exp(8.*[0])+TMath::Pi()/8.*TMath::SinH([0]*(7.5-x))*TMath::Sin(TMath::Pi()/8.*(7.5-x))+[0]*TMath::CosH([0]*(7.5-x))*TMath::Cos(TMath::Pi()/8.*(7.5-x))))+x",-0.5,7.5);
00090       corrF1->SetParameter(0,0.317);
00091 
00092       corrF2 = new TF1("corrF2","-8./TMath::Pi()*TMath::ATan(([0]*TMath::CosH([0]*(x-75.5))*TMath::Sin(TMath::Pi()/8.*(x-75.5))-TMath::Pi()/8.*TMath::SinH([0]*(x-75.5))*TMath::Cos(TMath::Pi()/8*(x-75.5)))/([0]*TMath::Exp(8.*[0])+TMath::Pi()/8.*TMath::SinH([0]*(x-75.5))*TMath::Sin(TMath::Pi()/8.*(x-75.5))+[0]*TMath::CosH([0]*(x-75.5))*TMath::Cos(TMath::Pi()/8.*(x-75.5))))+x",75.5,83.5);
00093       corrF2->SetParameter(0,0.317);
00094    }

00102    void HodoscopeWriteEngine::registerBranches( TTree* hostTree )
00103   {
00104   for (int ihod=0;ihod<2;ihod++) {
00105     if ( _prefix[ihod].size() > 0 )
00106       if ( _prefix[ihod][ _prefix[ihod].length()-1 ] != '_' )
00107         _prefix[ihod] += "_";
00108 
00109     /*---integrated values: information level 0---*/
00110 
00111     hostTree->Branch(string(_prefix[ihod]+"cycle").c_str(),     &_hitsFill.cycle[ihod], 
00112                      string(_prefix[ihod]+"cycle/I").c_str());
00113     hostTree->Branch(string(_prefix[ihod]+"tdc").c_str(),    &_hitsFill.tdc[ihod], 
00114                      string(_prefix[ihod]+"tdc/I").c_str());
00115     hostTree->Branch(string(_prefix[ihod]+"accept").c_str(),  &_hitsFill.accept[ihod], 
00116                      string(_prefix[ihod]+"accept/I").c_str());
00117 
00118     hostTree->Branch(string(_prefix[ihod]+"adc").c_str(), _hitsFill.adc[ihod], 
00119                      string(_prefix[ihod]+"adc[64]/I").c_str());
00120 
00121     hostTree->Branch(string(_prefix[ihod]+"nph").c_str(), _hitsFill.nph[ihod], 
00122                      string(_prefix[ihod]+"nph[64]/D").c_str());
00123 /*
00124     hostTree->Branch(string(_prefix[ihod]+"pedestal").c_str(), pedestal[ihod], 
00125                      string(_prefix[ihod]+"pedestal[64]/D").c_str());
00126 
00127     hostTree->Branch(string(_prefix[ihod]+"onePC").c_str(), onePC[ihod], 
00128                      string(_prefix[ihod]+"onePC[64]/D").c_str());
00129 */
00130     hostTree->Branch(string(_prefix[ihod]+"nRecoX").c_str(), &_hitsFill.nRecoX[ihod], 
00131                      string(_prefix[ihod]+"nRecoX/I").c_str());
00132 
00133     hostTree->Branch(string(_prefix[ihod]+"nRecoY").c_str(), &_hitsFill.nRecoY[ihod], 
00134                      string(_prefix[ihod]+"nRecoY/I").c_str());
00135 
00136     hostTree->Branch(string(_prefix[ihod]+"recoX").c_str(), _hitsFill.recoX[ihod], 
00137                      string(_prefix[ihod]+"recoX["+_prefix[ihod]+"nRecoX]/D").c_str());
00138 
00139     hostTree->Branch(string(_prefix[ihod]+"recoY").c_str(), _hitsFill.recoY[ihod], 
00140                      string(_prefix[ihod]+"recoY["+_prefix[ihod]+"nRecoY]/D").c_str());
00141 
00142     hostTree->Branch(string(_prefix[ihod]+"trueRecoX").c_str(), &_hitsFill.trueRecoX[ihod], 
00143                      string(_prefix[ihod]+"trueRecoX/D").c_str());
00144 
00145     hostTree->Branch(string(_prefix[ihod]+"trueRecoY").c_str(), &_hitsFill.trueRecoY[ihod], 
00146                      string(_prefix[ihod]+"trueRecoY/D").c_str());
00147 
00148   }
00149   }

00155   /*********************************************************************************/
00156   void HodoscopeWriteEngine::fillVariables( EVENT::LCEvent* evt ) 
00157   {
00158     LCCollection* inCol;
00159     
00160     try {
00161       for (int ih=0;ih<2;ih++) {
00162         inCol = evt->getCollection( _hitColName[ih] );
00163         int ihod;
00164         if(isModInverted) ihod = 1-ih;
00165         else ihod=ih;
00166 
00167         for ( int ielm = 0; ielm < inCol->getNumberOfElements(); ielm++ ) 
00168         {
00169           LCObject *obj = inCol->getElementAt(ielm);
00170           HodoscopeBlock lBlock(obj);
00171           
00172           cycle = lBlock.GetCycleN();
00173           tdc = lBlock.GetTDC();
00174           accept = lBlock.GetAccept();
00175           adc = lBlock.GetADC();
00176 
00177           _hitsFill.cycle[ihod] = cycle;
00178           _hitsFill.tdc[ihod] = tdc;
00179           _hitsFill.accept[ihod] = accept;
00180           for(auto itr = adc.begin(); itr != adc.end(); ++itr) {
00181             int channel = itr-adc.begin();
00182             if (channel>=64) {
00183               break;
00184             }
00185             _hitsFill.adc[ihod][channel] = *itr;
00186             _hitsFill.nph[ihod][channel] = adc2nph(*itr,ihod,channel);
00187           }
00188           recoverDeadCh();
00189 
00190           reconstruct(ihod);
00191           _hitsFill.nRecoX[ihod] = nReco[0];
00192           for (int n=0;n<_hitsFill.nRecoX[ihod];n++) {
00193             _hitsFill.recoX[ihod][n] = recoPos[0][n];
00194           }
00195           _hitsFill.nRecoY[ihod] = nReco[1];
00196           for (int n=0;n<_hitsFill.nRecoY[ihod];n++) {
00197             _hitsFill.recoY[ihod][n] = recoPos[1][n];
00198           }
00199         }/* end loop over all hits*/
00200       }
00201       inCol = evt->getCollection( _ahcColName );
00202       std::string encoding = inCol->getParameters().getStringVal( "CellIDEncoding");
00203       if (encoding == "")
00204       {
00205         LCParameters &param = inCol->parameters();
00206         //set default encoding if no encoding present
00207         param.setValue(LCIO::CellIDEncoding, "M:3,S-1:3,I:9,J:9,K-1:6");
00208         encoding = inCol->getParameters().getStringVal( "CellIDEncoding");
00209       }
00210       CellIDDecoder<CalorimeterHit> decoder(inCol);
00211       bool hasKminus1 = false;
00212       if (encoding.find("K-1") != std::string::npos)
00213       {
00214         hasKminus1 = true;
00215       }
00216       int nHits=0;
00217       for ( int cellCounter = 0; cellCounter < inCol->getNumberOfElements() && cellCounter < (int)MAXCELLS; cellCounter++ )
00218       {
00219         CalorimeterHit *hit = dynamic_cast<CalorimeterHit*>(inCol->getElementAt(cellCounter));
00220         _ahcHits.hitI[nHits] = decoder(hit)["I"];
00221         _ahcHits.hitJ[nHits] = decoder(hit)["J"];
00222 
00223         if (hasKminus1) _ahcHits.hitK[nHits] = decoder(hit)["K-1"]+1;
00224         else            _ahcHits.hitK[nHits] = decoder(hit)["K"];
00225 
00226         _ahcHits.hitEnergy[nHits] = hit->getEnergy();
00227         
00228         const float *hitPos = hit->getPosition();
00229         _ahcHits.hitPos[nHits][0] = hitPos[0];
00230         _ahcHits.hitPos[nHits][1] = hitPos[1];
00231         _ahcHits.hitPos[nHits][2] = hitPos[2];
00232         
00233         nHits++;
00234       }
00235       _ahcHits.nHits = nHits;
00236 
00237       int maxPass = 0;
00238       int maxNX1 =  0;
00239       int maxNX2 =  0;
00240       int maxNY1 =  0;
00241       int maxNY2 =  0;
00242       double minDis = 0.;
00243 
00244       for (int nx1=0;nx1<_hitsFill.nRecoX[0];nx1++) {
00245         for (int ny1=0;ny1<_hitsFill.nRecoY[0];ny1++) {
00246           for (int nx2=0;nx2<_hitsFill.nRecoX[1];nx2++) {
00247             for (int ny2=0;ny2<_hitsFill.nRecoY[1];ny2++) {
00248               int passPts = 0;
00249               double dissum = 0.;
00250               for (nHits=0;nHits<_ahcHits.nHits;nHits++) {
00251                 if (_ahcHits.hitEnergy[nHits]<350) continue;
00252                 double distance = trackDistance(_hitsFill.recoX[0][nx1],_hitsFill.recoY[0][ny1],_hitsFill.recoX[1][nx2],_hitsFill.recoY[1][ny2],_ahcHits.hitPos[nHits]);
00253                 if (distance < 30.) {
00254                   passPts++;
00255                   dissum += distance*distance;
00256                 }
00257               }
00258               if (passPts>maxPass || (passPts==maxPass && dissum<minDis)) {
00259                 maxPass = passPts;
00260                 maxNX1  = nx1;
00261                 maxNY1  = ny1;
00262                 maxNX2  = nx2;
00263                 maxNY2  = ny2;
00264                 minDis  = dissum;
00265               } 
00266             }
00267           }
00268         }
00269       }
00270 
00271       if (maxPass == 0) {
00272         _hitsFill.trueRecoX[0] = -10000;
00273         _hitsFill.trueRecoY[0] = -10000;
00274         _hitsFill.trueRecoX[1] = -10000;
00275         _hitsFill.trueRecoY[1] = -10000;
00276       } else {
00277         _hitsFill.trueRecoX[0] = _hitsFill.recoX[0][maxNX1];
00278         _hitsFill.trueRecoY[0] = _hitsFill.recoY[0][maxNY1];
00279         _hitsFill.trueRecoX[1] = _hitsFill.recoX[1][maxNX2];
00280         _hitsFill.trueRecoY[1] = _hitsFill.recoY[1][maxNY2];
00281       }
00282 
00283     }/*try*/
00284     
00285     catch ( DataNotAvailableException err ) 
00286       {
00287         resetHitsFill();
00288         streamlog_out(DEBUG) <<  "HodoscopeWriteEngine WARNING: Collection "<< _hitColName[0]
00289              << " not available in event "<< evt->getEventNumber() << endl;
00290       }/*catch*/
00291   }/*fillVariables*/
00292 
00293   void HodoscopeWriteEngine::resetHitsFill() {
00294     for (int ihod=0;ihod<2;ihod++) {
00295       _hitsFill.cycle[ihod] = 0;
00296       _hitsFill.tdc[ihod] = 0;
00297       _hitsFill.accept[ihod] = 0;
00298 
00299       for (int i=0; i<64; i++){
00300         _hitsFill.adc[ihod][i] = 0;
00301         _hitsFill.nph[ihod][i] = 0;
00302       }
00303       _hitsFill.nRecoX[ihod] = 0;
00304       _hitsFill.nRecoY[ihod] = 0;
00305       for (int i=0;i<8;i++){
00306         _hitsFill.recoX[ihod][i] = 0;
00307         _hitsFill.recoY[ihod][i] = 0;
00308       }
00309       _hitsFill.trueRecoX[ihod] = 0;
00310       _hitsFill.trueRecoY[ihod] = 0;
00311 
00312     }
00313   }
00314   
00315   double HodoscopeWriteEngine::adc2nph( int adc, int ihod, int ch ) 
00316   {
00317     
00318     double nph = (1.0*adc-pedestal[ihod][ch])/onePC[ihod][ch];
00319 
00320     if (nph<0) nph=0;
00321 
00322     return nph;
00323   }
00324 
00325   void HodoscopeWriteEngine::recoverDeadCh() {
00326     if(_hitsFill.nph[0][33] > 1 && _hitsFill.nph[0][35] > 1) {
00327       _hitsFill.nph[0][61] = _hitsFill.nph[0][34]*(_hitsFill.nph[0][60]+_hitsFill.nph[0][62])/(_hitsFill.nph[0][33]+_hitsFill.nph[0][35]);
00328     }
00329     if(_hitsFill.nph[1][7] > 1 && _hitsFill.nph[1][9] > 1) {
00330       _hitsFill.nph[1][20] = _hitsFill.nph[1][8]*(_hitsFill.nph[1][19]+_hitsFill.nph[1][21])/(_hitsFill.nph[1][7]+_hitsFill.nph[1][9]);
00331     }
00332     if(_hitsFill.nph[1][10] > 1 && _hitsFill.nph[1][12] > 1) {
00333       _hitsFill.nph[1][23] = _hitsFill.nph[1][11]*(_hitsFill.nph[1][22]+_hitsFill.nph[1][24])/(_hitsFill.nph[1][10]+_hitsFill.nph[1][12]);
00334     }
00335   }
00336 
00337   void HodoscopeWriteEngine::reconstruct(int ihod) {
00338     double xsum,ysum;
00339   
00340     for (int axis=0;axis<2;axis++) {
00341       xsum=0;
00342       ysum=0;
00343       for(int fiber=0;fiber<16;fiber++) {
00344         int ch[2];
00345         chAt(fiber,ihod,axis,ch);
00346         double nphsum = _hitsFill.nph[ihod][ch[0]]+_hitsFill.nph[ihod][ch[1]];
00347         xsum += nphsum*Cos(thetaWith(fiber));
00348         ysum += nphsum*Sin(thetaWith(fiber));
00349       }
00350       double theta = argWith(xsum,ysum);
00351       double reco=fiberWith(theta);
00352       if (theta<0) {
00353         nReco[axis]=0;
00354       } else {
00355         nReco[axis]=(83.5-reco)/16+1;
00356       }
00357       for(int n=0;n<nReco[axis];n++) {
00358         recoPos[axis][n]=(edgeCorrection(reco+n*16) - 41.5)*pitch;
00359         //recoPos[axis][n]=(reco+n*16 - 41.5)*pitch;
00360       }
00361     }
00362   }
00363   double HodoscopeWriteEngine::trackDistance(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2, float * pos) {
00364     double z1, z2;
00365     z1 = height1 * 43.3;
00366     z2 = height2 * 43.3;
00367 
00368     double intercept[2];
00369     intercept[0] = ((pos[2]-z1)*x2 + (z2-pos[2])*x1) / (z2-z1);
00370     intercept[1] = ((pos[2]-z1)*y2 + (z2-pos[2])*y1) / (z2-z1);
00371 
00372     double distance = Sqrt((pos[0]-intercept[0])*(pos[0]-intercept[0])+(pos[1]-intercept[1])*(pos[1]-intercept[1]));
00373     return distance;
00374   }
00375   void HodoscopeWriteEngine::chAt(int fiber, int ihod, int axis, int *ch) {
00376     if (ihod==0) {
00377       if (axis==0) {
00378         ch[0]=32+(fiber+12)%16;
00379         ch[1]=63-(fiber+12)%16;
00380       } else {
00381         ch[0]=15-(fiber+12)%16;
00382         ch[1]=16+(fiber+12)%16;
00383       }
00384     } else {
00385       if (axis==0) {
00386         ch[0]=fiber;
00387         ch[1]=16+(fiber+12)%16;
00388       } else {
00389         ch[0]=47-fiber;
00390         ch[1]=48+fiber;
00391       }
00392     }
00393   }
00394   double HodoscopeWriteEngine::thetaWith(int fiber) {
00395     return (fiber+0.5)*2.*Pi()/16.;
00396   }
00397   double HodoscopeWriteEngine::fiberWith(double theta) {
00398     return theta*16./2./Pi() - 0.5;
00399   }
00400   double HodoscopeWriteEngine::argWith(double x, double y) {
00401     if (x==0) return -1;
00402     double arg = ATan(y/x);
00403     if(x<0) arg += Pi();
00404     if(arg<0) arg += 2*Pi();
00405     return arg;
00406   }
00407   double HodoscopeWriteEngine::edgeCorrection(double x) {
00408     if (x<8.5) {
00409       x = corrF1->GetX(x,-0.5,7.5);
00410     } else if (x>76.5) {
00411       x = corrF2->GetX(x,75.5,83.5);
00412     }
00413     return x;
00414   }
